vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐννεύω,
nod or make signs to, ἐννεύει με φεύγειν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐ. τινὶ τὸ τί ἂν θέλοι.. ask him by signs what.., [NT]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to make a sign, nod
to nod at, signify by a nod; to make signs; to intimate by signs, Lk. 1:62*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: để làm một dấu hiệu bằng cách gật đầu; ra dấu hiệu; giao tiếp bằng cử chỉ. ἐν (G1722) + νεύω (G3506)
